Welcome to the **EMC Programming Caf√©**! 

We are a (self-organised) group of bio-medical researchers based at [**Erasmus Medical Center**](https://www.erasmusmc.nl/en/) (in Rotterdam, NL). Our *glorious purpose* is to support each other with all sort of "coding matters". We talk about programming, scripting, software configs, visualization, stats and open science challenges in general.

We meet (usually bi-monthly) to share knowledge, "pair program", review each others' code or, sometimes, just to have a chat.

You could sumamrise our interests into 6 general *themes*:

* [**UserR manual**]{.highlight}: R programming (general coding advice + specific tools)
* [**Piece of Py**]{.highlight}: Python programming (general coding advice + specific tools)
* [**SpaGitHub**]{.highlight}: Git and Github witchery
* [**CLI & chill**]{.highlight}: getting to know the shell (aka bash / console / terminal / command line / linux stuff) + working on a shared server (e.g. SLURM tips and tricks)
* [**Coding Couture**]{.highlight}: making pretty things (data visualization, website developent, quarto)
* [**Stats** *(we ran out of silly names)*]{.highlight}: Statistics, modeling and other mathy things

:::{.callout}
We are part of a larger **network of programming cafes** ([chek it out!](https://github.com/code-cafes-nl))
:::
